MV. PACIFIC MERIT (63K/ 18BLT)
TYPE: SINGLE DECK GEARED BULK CARRIER, GRAIN FITTED FLAG: HK
BUILT AND YEAR: 2018 CLASS: CCS
DWT ABOUT 63,494 MT ON 13.3M SSW TPC ABOUT 62.3
LOA/BEAM/DEPTH MOULDED: ABOUT 199.9M/ 32.26M/18.5M GRT/NRT: ABOUT 36,449 MT/21,646 MT
CAPACITY GRAIN/BALE: ABOUT 78,908.6 CBM/ABOUT 73,680 CBM
5 HATCHES/5 HOLDS: 1) 19.68M X 18.26M, 2-5)22.96M X 18.26 M NO.3 CARGO HOLD DESIGNED AS A WATER BALLAST TANK
GEAR AND GRAB: 4X30MT SINGLE DECK CRANE AND 4X12CBM GRAB SPEED/CONSUMPTION:
BALLAST/ LADEN
ABOUT 14.5/ABOUT 14.0KTS ABOUT 26/ABOUT 28 MT PER DAY IFO RMG 380 CST ON MAIN ENGINE + ABOUT 2.2 MT ON AUX UNDER GOOD WEATHER CONDITION UPTO BEAUFORT FORCE 4
AND DOUGLAS SEA STATE 3
GUARANTEED ECONOMY SPEED/CONSUMPTION:
LADEN: ABT 12.0 KTS ON ABT 21.5 MT IFO 380 BALLAST: ABT 12.8 KTS ON ABT 20.0 MT IFO 380
INPORT WORKING ABOUT 5.5MT IFO 380 CST/DAY IDEL ABOUT 3.5MT IFO 380CST/DAY NO MDO
AT SEA AND IN PORT EXCEPT BAD/COLD WEATHER AND/OR ENTERING INTO OR LEAVING FROM PORT OF CALL AND/OR MANEUVERING IN NARROW/SHALLOW/CONGESTED WATER AND/OR
BALLASTING/DEBALLASTING OPERATIONS. BUNKER GRADE:
LSIFO ISO8217-2017 RMG380(380CST) OR LATEST MGO ISO8217-2017 DMA OR LATEST BUNKER CAPACITY 100%: ABOUT 2000CBM DIESEL OIL TANKS CAPACITY 100%:110 CBM LSMGO TANKS CAPACITY 100%: 130CBM NO MIXING OF BUNKERS IN ONE TANK.
-ADA-
